title: THURSDAY - TNF Preview/NFC North Showdown 2020
itunes:title: THURSDAY - TNF Preview/NFC North Showdown 2020
description:
Sunday brings us a big-time NFC North showdown between the Steelers and Ravens (0:06), we'll hear from Ravens head coach John Harbaugh (0:48) on what he thinks about Ben Roethlisberger. Browns quarterback Baker Mayfield talks about the theory of Cleveland being a better offense without Odell Beckham Jr (1:31). The Cowboys making moves ahead of Tuesday's trade deadline (1:56) and Bruce Arians comments on the addition of wide receiver Antonio Brown (2:21). We'll also preview Thursday night's matchup between the Falcons and Panthers (2:50), plus the latest news on Christian McCaffrey's status for the game

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
